snippet: Georgia tailback Todd Gurley is out for the season after tearing his left knee this weekend, possibly ending his college career in a rocky year that began with Heisman Trophy hopes....

headline.print_headline: Georgia Loses Gurley to Season-Ending Knee Injury
headline.main: Georgia Loses Gurley to Season-Ending Knee Injury

lead_paragraph: Georgia tailback Todd Gurley is out for the season after tearing his left knee this weekend, possibly ending his college career in a rocky year that began with Heisman Trophy hopes.
